name: Dicey Assault
description:
CONTROLS:

Only WASD.

STORY: You are a dice, for whatever reason, and you are wandering in a sewer, again for whatever reason. In the sewers you find monsters that end up murdering or not murdering you, depending on how much of an ultimate gamer you are. Good luck. ACTUALLY USEFUL INFO:

You are the white dice with a blue outline, and in the beginning of your turn you roll yourself and your dice's number dictates the amount of times you can move. So for example if you get a roll of 5, you can move 5 times before the enemies can move again.

All of the enemies move only once, except for the red dice enemy that you can find after level 4.

After each cleared level, the Golden Dice shop opens at the right of the screen, where you can buy extra damage or extra health. 

When you clear the whole game, you are presented with a golden dice collectable, if you pick it up, on each next replay you can see a little marker at the top right of the screen, indicating you have completed the game.
